name: Starstruck (itch) (CircoDinamita)
description:
for better gameplay use fullscreen ^^ Another aesthetic high school gay romance? YES!

Welcome to Starstruck, a short and casual Visual Novel/ Ottome in wish you play as a handsome high schooler named Kenta, the captain of the Judo team who has the same luck with relationships than with money, which is... None.

After weeks of trying to get a job to pay for transportation for the next week's judo tournament and failing. Life will turn for the worst when a new student enrolls in his semester, A high-class K-pop star named Choi, with everyone excited Kenta is the odd man out, he just can’t understand how people can put him over all the other excellent bands of the year (cough cough trash panda). 

But what will happen when this diva of a superstar takes an interest in us… 

The protagonist... The love Interest...

 

Feature
  • 1K+ words! (It’s a short demo)
  • ( 7min gameplay) 
  • Male Protagonist 
  • 4 Endings 
  • 1 minigame
Rating: Teen Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android Romance: Enemies to lovers No explicit imagery - Safe for streaming
